author: eth2_bridge_bot
content:

~ 17 hours until the Phase 2 call.
Updated agenda here:
https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-pm/issues/119

If you'd like an invite to the call, just ping me.

We'll be brainstorming/discussing 2/3 topics listed. The following resources will be best to review ahead of time:
- https://ethresear.ch/t/state-provider-models-in-ethereum-2-0/6750
- https://ethresear.ch/t/phase-1-fee-market-and-eth1-eth2-bridging/6775
- https://ethresear.ch/t/an-even-simpler-meta-execution-environment-for-eth/6704 and some questions we put together and explainer - https://hackmd.io/sstJC00xTCic9ABhSpjmYQ?view
